page.title: 15HOUSING IN OTLEY DISTRICT
page.content: {The larger houses of Otley}tend to have four or five bedrooms, with large living and dining rooms.These extend on average to 16ft x 14ft. Most of these houses have spacious breakfast kitchens or a kitchen and breakfast room. The price of these houses tends to vary from one area to another. The houses in Burley are often quite expensive, on average about Â£65,000, and are usually occupied by well established business owners. {FAMILY HOUSES}- The newer type of houses in Otley are all around the age of ten years old. They are built in light brick and sometimes have a panel of pebble dashing, wood or painted brick. Many have dormer windows and nearly all have adjoining garages. They are quite spacious inside with two floors and a loft. They have three or four bedrooms.
